description: Import an existing wallet using its private key. For new wallets, a Gnosis Safe contract will be deployed before trading starts.
title: Import Wallet

warning.description: Do not import private keys exported from Polymarket. These keys belong to Proxy Wallets (created via Email or Google login with MagicLink), and our service requires Gnosis Safe wallets.
warning.learnMore: Learn more about Polymarket wallet types
